description: One of the cats at the feeding station appears to be injured, requires immediate veterinary attention.
The feeding station equipment is malfunctioning, urgent repair needed to ensure proper food distribution.
Food supply is dangerously low, requires immediate refill to prevent starvation among the cats.
Water dispenser at the feeding station is broken, immediate replacement or repair needed.
Several cats at the feeding station are showing symptoms of illness, need veterinary assessment and treatment.
The feeding station gate is stuck, preventing cats from accessing food, urgent repair required.
The feeding station roof is damaged, exposing food to weather, urgent repair needed to prevent spoilage.
Water source at the feeding station is contaminated, immediate replacement or purification needed.
Food supply is critically low, immediate refill required to prevent hunger and malnutrition.
A cat at the feeding station is displaying severe symptoms of dehydration, immediate medical attention required.
